title: Lamberto Bava's UNTIL DEATH (Per Sempre) 720p
description:
Lamberto Bava's UNTIL DEATH (aka "Brivido Giallo: Per Sempre") [720p .mkv multi-audio]
IMDB | horror | 1987 |Italy
Directed by Lamberto Bava, starring Gioia Scola, Marco Vivio, David Brandon.

Eight years ago, Linda and her lover Carlo murdered Linda's husband while she was pregnant with his son. Now running a small hotel near a fishing lake, Carlo and Linda are raising young Alex together. On a rainy night, a drifter named Marco arrives at the hotel. It soon becomes clear Marco knows a lot about Linda's dead husband...

Starring the beautiful Gioia Scola and based on a story by Lucio Fulci, "Until Death" is a slow-paced, atmospheric TV-film, and by far the best of the four episodes of Italian horror anthology "Brivido Giallo".
